H3.text: where is denmark situated. Euroregion Baltic

A4.text: Denmark is the southernmost of the Scandinavian countries, lying southwest of Sweden, south of Norway, and north of Germany

A5.text: Denmark proper is situated between the North Sea to the west and the Baltic Sea to the east

A6.text: The North Sea lies between Great Britain, Denmark, Norway, Germany, the Netherlands, Belgium, and France.
